about_the_game:
Master the tactical battles of DWARFS FIGHT , the 100% Free-to-Play competitive turn-based strategy game[/b]. Discover a variety of chess-like modes, from friendly to competitive multiplayer, so outwit your opponents and rise to the top of the leaderboard!

Select your dwarf team, position them strategically and try to win. With hundreds of team combinations, every strategy is possible... but there's only one winner. Thanks to cross-play, play online for free with all your friends on PC, Mac, mobiles and tablets!

A new lease of life for TOURS BY TOURS

DWARFS FIGHT is inspired by the famous game of chess and is based on the concept of only one life point per unit, while retaining the strategic depth characteristic of turn-based play to offer intense, fast-paced games[/b]!

ROUND BY ROUND INTENSE

Prepare your dwarf team wisely before each battle and intelligently exploit all the stratagems at your disposal to achieve victory! Team compositions are virtually limitless, with numerous dwarf archetypes featuring unique abilities to play according to your style. Triumph in battle, gain experience and new dwarves, customize your equipment, unlock team synergies and evolve your strategy.

VICTORY IS ACHIEVED BY TALENT... NOT LUCK

Experience millions of RNG-free battles, where the slightest mistake can be fatal! Etch your name in the various rankings and treat spectators to epic battles! Benefit from a balanced matchmaking system and Elo ranking to avoid frustration!

CROSS-PLATFORM AFFORDATE

Prove your intelligence anywhere! With a shared account, play DWARFS FIGHT on PC, Mac, mobile or tablet.

WAITING FOR EARLY ACCESS...

Add DWARFS FIGHT to your wishlist on Steam and follow us to stay informed! Join DWARFS FIGHT players on the official Discord server to talk about the game, take part in tournaments, find your clan, and make friends!
